title: Who absolutely shits on Darius?????
body:
If I HAVE to pick after him and he's not banned who do I play?

I love to mainly play gnar top right now and it's a difficult lane. I have to play extremely well against him and Ive beaten him well before but if I have a poppy jungle and they have hecarim I'm gonna be screwed. he does get exceptionally fast when he gets phage, So does gnar but he can pull you from almost auto rang so even when you get mallet it can be difficult. 

That fucking passive man
